product.title: Calvin Klein CK One
product.description: CK One by Calvin Klein is a classic unisex fragrance, known for its fresh and clean scent. It's a versatile fragrance suitable for everyday wear.

product.title: Red Nail Polish
product.description: The Red Nail Polish offers a rich and glossy red hue for vibrant and polished nails. With a quick-drying formula, it provides a salon-quality finish at home.

product.title: Eyeshadow Palette with Mirror
product.description: The Eyeshadow Palette with Mirror offers a versatile range of eyeshadow shades for creating stunning eye looks. With a built-in mirror, it's convenient for on-the-go makeup application.
